alert.note: Alert for Clay (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 10:32AM CDT until May 20 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River at Spencer affecting Clay County. Little Sioux River near Milford affecting Dickinson County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River above Spencer / Highway 18 affecting Clay County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sioux River at Spencer. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, the right bank overflows, and minor flooding of the Spencer city park and some rural agricultural areas begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 10.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CDT Tuesday was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.8 feet this afternoon. It should gradually fall below flood stage of 10.0 feet by Friday, and then continue falling to around 9.5 feet by Sunday. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Little Sioux River Spencer 10.0 10.7 Tue 9 am 10.5 10.2 9.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning by 11 AM CDT.
